subject: Set Returning method
msgSnippet: how to write junit test case of method which are return Set or List. code of methods // for test public Set getPredecessors() { if (this.predecessors != null)
messageBody:
how to write junit test case of method which are return Set or List.

code of methods

// for test



public Set getPredecessors()
{
if (this.predecessors != null)
{
StringBuffer sbId = new StringBuffer();
sbId.append("");

for (Iterator iter = this.predecessors.iterator(); iter.hasNext();)
{
WorkflowStepPredecessor wsp = (WorkflowStepPredecessor) iter
.next();
// Lonmg ws=wsd.getPredecessorId();
if (sbId.toString().equals(""))
{
sbId.append(wsp.getPredecessorStep().getWfPosition());
} else
{
sbId.append(",").append(
wsp.getPredecessorStep().getWfPosition());
}
}
setPredecessorsIds(sbId.toString());
}
return this.predecessors;
}


// setter method


public void setPredecessors(Set predecessors)
{

this.predecessors = predecessors;
}
